metadata.title: CVE-2019-19907 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
HrAddFBBlock in libfreebusy/freebusyutil.cpp in Kopano Groupware Corebefore 8.7.7 allows out-of-bounds access, as demonstrated by mishandling ofan array copy during parsing of ICal data.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-19907` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

kopano-archiver - 8.7.0-6ubuntu1
kopano-backup - 8.7.0-6ubuntu1
kopano-common - 8.7.0-6ubuntu1
kopano-contacts - 8.7.0-6ubuntu1
kopano-core - 8.7.0-6ubuntu1
kopano-dagent - 8.7.0-6ubuntu1
kopano-gateway - 8.7.0-6ubuntu1
kopano-ical - 8.7.0-6ubuntu1
kopano-l10n - 8.7.0-6ubuntu1
kopano-libs - 8.7.0-6ubuntu1
kopano-monitor - 8.7.0-6ubuntu1
kopano-presence - 8.7.0-6ubuntu1
kopano-search - 8.7.0-6ubuntu1
kopano-server - 8.7.0-6ubuntu1
kopano-spamd - 8.7.0-6ubuntu1
kopano-spooler - 8.7.0-6ubuntu1
kopano-utils - 8.7.0-6ubuntu1
php-mapi - 8.7.0-6ubuntu1
python3-kopano - 8.7.0-6ubuntu1
python3-mapi - 8.7.0-6ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: kopanocore package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '8.7.0-6ubuntu1').
